Definition at line 56 of file ArrayLoader.php.

◆ flatten()

flatten ( array &  $messages,
array  $subnode = null,
  $path = null 
)
private

Flattens an nested array of translations.

The scheme used is: 'key' => array('key2' => array('key3' => 'value')) Becomes: 'key.key2.key3' => 'value'

This function takes an array by reference and will modify it

Parameters
array&$messagesThe array that will be flattened
array$subnodeCurrent subnode being parsed, used internally for recursive calls
string$pathCurrent path being parsed, used internally for recursive calls
